pages.title: Cluster Bomb
pages.text: $(bold)When accuracy isn't your strength. Spread your bets!$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_cluster_warhead, ordinance_core, and either ordinance_fins or ordinance_thruster. Place horizontally with fins or thruster aligned at the tail.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Point H at the target; T is fins or thruster at the rear.
